values:
I wasted no time after sending off Remus' Owl and shoved the books I'd been using in the library back on the shelf, hurrying out and up the stairs.

I felt awful for forgetting tha it had been the full moon.  Normally I remembered and could at the very least be there when he got back.

But I'd been such an utter prat lately that I'd forgotten entirely.
Stupid of me..

I managed to slip through to the dorms un-noticed by anyone else and found Remus looking rather sickly.

"Heya mate..."  I said quietly, sitting down beside his feet on the bed.  "Can I get anything for you?"

<lj-cut text="Owl to Remus Lupin">

Remus,

Are we okay?  I haven't talked to you in days.
I haven't been avoiding you, but I don't know if you've been avoiding me.

Can we meet?  Talk, at least?  Even if it's through Owls?

Sirius

<lj-cut text="Warded Owl to Remus Lupin">

Remus,

You know that thing you mentioned last year?

Well...I know there was many things, but that one THING in particular?

I don't want to mention it in the owl in case someone gets hold of it, even though I warded it.

You don' have a clue what I'm talking about, do you?

We need to meet then. Soon.

-Sirius B
